import FilterDecade from "./FilterDecade"; import FilterCharacter from "./FilterCharacter"; import FilterKeyword from "./FilterKeyword"; import FilterDirector from "./FilterDirector"; import FilterActor from "./FilterActor"; import FilterSource from "./FilterSource"; import FilterScenario from "./FilterScenario"; import FilterAdaptation from "./FilterAdaptation"; function Controller({ decades, handleFilterChange, keywords, characters, actors, scenarios, directors, sources, adaptations, handleReset, }) { return (
{/* * * * * * * * CtrA * * * * * * */}

DECADE
⦙⦙⦙⦙⦙⦙⦙⦙⦙⦙⦙⦙⦙⦙⦙⦙⦙

handleFilterChange("decade", filter, isChecked) } />
{/* 캐릭터 섹션 */}

handleFilterChange("keyword", filter, isChecked) } />

handleFilterChange("actor", filter, isChecked) } />
{/* 감독 섹션 */}
handleFilterChange("director", filter, isChecked) } />
{/* 원작자 섹션 */}
handleFilterChange("source", filter, isChecked) } />
{/* 각본 섹션 */}
handleFilterChange("scenario", filter, isChecked) } />
{/* 각색 섹션 */}
handleFilterChange("adaptation", filter, isChecked) } />
{/* * * * * * * * CtrD * * * * * * */}
